headline.main: Airlines Are Needed in Africa; Free Erench Establishing Them; Equatorial Colony Needs Better Facilities for Transportation -- American Mission Encourages Pioneer Settlers

lead_paragraph: BANGUI, Ubangi, Shari Territory, French Equatorial Africa, Oct. 19 -- The white population of this garrison town and small administrative and trading center has increased sixfold while other similar places have recorded rises that are even greater.
abstract: French Equatorial Africa war role discussed

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
